amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to issue a report on the removal of lead-based paint and other hazardous materials.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3621 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to issue a report on the removal of lead-based paint and other hazardous materials.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3621 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3621 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
